channel.title: Photoshop on Farzad Hayatbakhsh
channel.description: Recent content in Photoshop on Farzad Hayatbakhsh

item.title: Breakout
item.description: Demo Video A third-person adventure game made for Android. The goal is to rescue the hostages and lead them to the exit. This game was made in 2019 as a school project between Toby Tinker and myself. My role was programming and level design. Toby’s role was modelling and textures. This game was made using Unity3D, C#, and Magicavoxel. Download for Android

item.title: Droid Invasion
item.description: Demo Video A first-person shooter game made for Windows. The goal is to kill enemy droids and survive as long as possible. This game was made in 2018 as a school project between Farzad Hayatbakhsh and Toby Tinker. My role was programming and level design. Toby’s role was modelling and textures. This game was made using Unity3D, C# and Blender. Download for Windows
